subject: Olympic Games (2008)
United States Armament and Defense
Olympic Games
Firearms
lead_paragraph: Members of the Army Marksmanship Unit, a little-known squad dedicated to training and employing Olympic-level shooters, have won 21 Olympic medals.
snippet: Members of the Army Marksmanship Unit, a little-known squad dedicated to training and employing Olympic-level shooters, have won 21 Olympic medals.
